name: A Wonderful Way with Dragons - Poster Image

metadata.created_by: Delfine Paolini, Rene Bastian, Henri Prestes, Sarah Rosen & Adam Lukens
metadata.name: A Wonderful Way with Dragons - Poster Image
metadata.description:
The Poster Image for the film A Wonderful Way with Dragons was shot by world-renowned photographer Henri Prestes. 

Prestes, a friend of the film’s producers, read the script and offered to lend his unique vision to the project by seeking out the majestic mare mentioned in the story. He searched small villages throughout his home country of Portugal, and finally came upon a mare in the wild.   

Known for his melancholic, dream-like images, Prestes perfectly captured the tone of the film’s drama and offered the image to the producers, endorsing their endeavor to raise money for the film with 50% of the proceeds from the sale of this Digital Collectible going to the charity, New York Cares, to support "Stand With Students" - the city's largest initiative to assist the Students and Teachers of Title I NYC Public Schools.
